original_text: But when they went out to bury her, not much of her body was still there. They found only her skull, her feet and her hands.
korean_text: 가서 장사하려 한즉 그 두골과 발과 그의 손 외에는 찾지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: But when they went out to bury her,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들이 그녀를 묻으러 나갔을 때,

sentences.original_text: not much of her body was still there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 몸的大部分은 이미 남아있지 않았다.
